link.description: Source of the probabilistic data structure.

probability.description: The false positive rate of the probabilistic data structure.

total-bits.description: The number of bits used by this probabilistic data structure.

total-capacity.description: The total capacity of the total set represented in this probabilistic data structure.

type.description: Type of the probabilistic data structure.

updatable.description: Is the probabilistic data structure updatable?

used-capacity.description: The used capacity (and cardinality) of the set represented in this probabilistic data structure.

vendor-implementation-ref.description: Details about the implementation of the probabilistic data structure.

description: Probabilistic data structure object describe a space-efficient data structure such as Bloom filter or similar structure.
name: probabilistic-data-structure
